email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily Carter,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer MV SEA HORIZON for your 12,500MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama under CIF terms.

Our starting freight quote is USD 45.50 per metric ton. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. The proposed laycan is from 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising the quote to USD 42.00 per metric ton?

Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's draft?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 43.25 per metric ton. The vessel's draft is 14.5m, and the demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day.

Please let us know if this revised rate works for you so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised quote. We are willing to accept the rate of USD 43.25 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Could you also confirm the vessel's ETA at Newcastle and the estimated time for loading?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. The vessel's ETA at Newcastle is 2023-10-19, and the estimated loading time is 2 days, ensuring we meet the laycan of 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

We will proceed with the necessary documentation and keep you updated on any developments.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Everything looks good on our end. Please proceed with the finalization of the agreement. We look forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
